summary: Phase 4 UI/UX Testing: Analytics, FinancialAid, Settings, AdminDashboard, and MobileBottomNav 'More' menu. Successfully verified mobile-first responsive design, Playfair Display headings, teal/amber color scheme in charts, responsive tabs (icon-only mobile, full text desktop), and functional 'More' menu Sheet with 6 navigation items. Identified one horizontal scroll issue on Analytics page at tablet breakpoint (768px).

ui_bugs.issue: Horizontal scroll on tablet viewport (768px) - body width 909px exceeds viewport
ui_bugs.selector: TabsList with className='inline-flex min-w-full w-max sm:w-full'
ui_bugs.root_cause: The w-max class on TabsList (line 329 in Analytics.js) causes tabs to expand beyond viewport width on tablet when text becomes visible at sm breakpoint. The w-max overrides sm:w-full constraint.
ui_bugs.suggested_fix: Remove w-max from TabsList or change to w-full on tablet breakpoint. Consider using grid layout instead of inline-flex for better responsive control.

items.issue: Analytics page horizontal scroll on tablet (768px)
items.suggested_fix: Change to: TabsList className='inline-flex w-full' OR TabsList className='grid grid-cols-6 w-full' for better responsive control
items.explanation: The w-max class causes TabsList to expand beyond viewport on tablet when tab text becomes visible at sm breakpoint. Removing w-max or using grid layout will prevent horizontal scroll.
